title: Electoral reform: a vote for change?
abstract:
For the first time in decades, voting reform is a real possibility in the UK. Simon Hix, Ron Johnston and Iain McLean outline the proposed changes.\ud
\ud
The Con–Lib coalition has put voting reform firmly on the agenda but will this really change how the House of Commons and the House of Lords work?Simon Hix, Ron Johnston and Iain McLean explore the proposed reforms and predict their likely impact on the British political scene
publisher: Sage Publishing in association with Political Studies Association
